inclusion.criterion: infiltrating ductal breast carcinoma by biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: located > 1 cm from the chest wall and the skin
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: followed up for a period of two years
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Personal history of ipsilateral breast cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Suspicion of intraductal extension or multifocality by mammography or MRI
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Distance to muscle or skin <1 cm
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of smoking and alcohol consumption. She has had lumpectomy and axillary sampling, and is currently using multivitamins daily.
